name: GEMSGenie
0:
”Alexa open Gems Genie”
”Alexa, ask Gems Genie where is my child”
”Alexa ask Gems Genie time table for today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gems genie
Developer Terms of Use
des: Hello, my name is Genie, and I'm your personal educational assistant powered by artificial intelligence. I can provide educational, administrative, and school related information such as school fees, child's location, timetable, assignment dates and many more.
